body: @Komi-san died for our sins Ay thank you po sa pagreply. Hindi kasi namin masundan yung mga ganitong gawa na pambabae lalo na palaging chinese lang ang sulat. Ayos na rin yan.

@Raffy Tulfo In Action the story starts with the uke going to the police station to turned himself in bc he thought he had killed his boss but it turns out it was just a dream; he apologizes to the officer for what happened and realizes that he's his type so they start hanging out and have sex a couple of times and after some drama they start a relationship, sorry for my bad english
Gusto rin namin itanong. May mga tao ba talagang nagbabasa ng ganito?
Pwede po bang may magsabi kung anong kwento nito? Hindi kami nakaka-intindi ng intsik.
谢谢招待，百濑老师最棒了 ❤️❤️
